function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of sensors without proper calibration could lead to inaccurate measurements of IAQ parameters.","Impact":"Inaccurate measurements could lead to incorrect assessment of indoor air quality, risking the health of building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement regular calibration of sensors and use standard calibration procedures to ensure accuracy of measurements.","Technologies":"Standard calibration procedures, sensor calibration tools.","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Maintenance and facility management team"},{"Description":"Improper data transmission strategy may result in high power consumption and redundant network traffic.","Impact":"High power consumption and redundant network traffic can lead to increased energy costs and inefficient operation of the IAQ monitoring system.","Mitigation":"Implement efficient data transmission strategy to minimize power consumption and reduce redundant network traffic.","Technologies":"Data encryption, data compression, IoT protocols for efficient transmission.","People":"Maintenance and facility management team","Owner":"Technology deployment team"},{"Description":"Failure to reduce computational burden of sensing nodes may lead to shorter battery life of the monitoring system.","Impact":"Shorter battery life reduces the effectiveness of the IAQ monitoring system and requires frequent maintenance and battery replacements.","Mitigation":"Optimize computational processes to reduce the burden on sensing nodes and extend battery life.","Technologies":"Edge computing, sensor data processing algorithms, low-power microcontrollers.","People":"Maintenance and facility management team","Owner":"Technology deployment team"}]}
